Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard runs north and south from here.
Room.LongDescription: To the south is the Khelleva Circle, which is a circular traffic path with a large oak tree in its center. The Circle was designed to alleviate the traffic in this part of the city, and was bui8lt by the Khelleva Family as a memorial to themselves. West of you is an odd looking building with a huge gem perched on top of it. No one has ever figured out exactly what it is that holds the gem up there, though.
